summary: This document contains a Certificate of Limited Liability Company Resolutions authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to act as a depositary, custodian, or investment advisor for a limited liability company. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers for managing accounts and the responsibilities of the bank in relation to these accounts.
keyFacts: The document certifies the authority of certain individuals to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It outlines the responsibilities and powers of the Authorized Signers in relation to the company's accounts.
The document states that the bank may rely on the instructions of the Authorized Signers unless notified otherwise.
It confirms that no one other than the company has any interest in the accounts opened in the company's name.
The document is dated September 11, 2019, indicating when the resolutions were adopted.
